item.title: Welcome to DSCI 221!

item.description:
Welcome to DSCI 221: Data Structures and Algorithms for Data Science!

In this course, we’ll explore how the right data structure can turn an impossible problem into a trivial one. From the magic of hash tables (how does Shazam identify a song in milliseconds?) to graph algorithms (what’s the cheapest flight to Tokyo?), you’ll develop the algorithmic thinking that separates good programmers from great ones.

Getting started:

  • Read the syllabus for course policies and requirements
  • Check the schedule on the home page to see what’s coming up
  • Come to class ready to think about puzzles!

See you in class!
